players.name: Alice
memory: You: " I'm shocked by Bob's death and want to know who could have done it."
Charlie: " I think we should focus on Diana, they were the last one to interact with Bob before his death."
Charlie: "I think we should lynch Diana, they have been acting suspiciously and were the last one to interact with Bob."
